alert.note: Alert for Greene; Hale; Marengo; Sumter (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 24 at 1:36PM CST until further notice by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Alabama... Tombigbee River At Demopolis Lock and Dam affecting Sumter, Hale, Marengo and Greene Counties. .Heavy rainfall is expected over the Tombigbee River basin and a flood warning is now in effect for the Tombigbee River. The next statement will be issued Wednesday evening.late tonight at 445 AM CST. && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tombigbee River at Demopolis Lock and Dam. * WHEN...From Saturday morning until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:15 PM CST Wednesday the stage was 36.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late Saturday morning and continue rising to a crest of 70.6 feet early Monday morning. - Flood stage is 68.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
